data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Lakes.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Lakes, South Sudan
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: the state of Lakes has (about) 59,324 people who know Jesus, 251,153 people who know about him culturally, and 235,723 people who are far from Jesus.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 9 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Lakes, South Sudan will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the state of Lakes against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Arab, Mongallese people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Lakes words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Lakes, South Sudan from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Lakes.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

location.name: Lakes
location.people_groups_list: Reel, Atwot, Morokodo, Nyamusa-Molo, Beli, Jur Beli, Gweri
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Reel, Atwot (73,000), Morokodo (48,000), Nyamusa-Molo (1,600), Beli, Jur Beli (62,000), Gweri (1,400)
